entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blue River Airport 10:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
